# On-going Morality Research:
- Moral Judgement as Categorisation
  - Meaning Maintenance and Morality
- Moral Dumbfounding
- Miscellaneous: Identity, and Networks


## Moral Judgement as Categorisation
- See [\color{blue}this paper currently under review\color{black}](https://psyarxiv.com/72dzp/)

### Testable Predictions/Possible Studies
- Typicality in moral categorisations?
- Non-moral dumbfounding
- Equivalent contextual influences
  - e.g., order effects (ethics approved)
- Additional predictions in Table 2 in paper

### Meaning Maintenance and Morality
- *Difficult* Moral judgements as a threat to meaning
- Test *fluid compensation* in non-moral paradigm (ethics approved)
- Test *fluid compensation* in moral paradigm (ethics approved)
  - Some data collected 

## Moral Dumbfounding
- Cognitive Load Studies (ethics approved)
- Distancing Studies (ethics approved)
- Non-Weird Studies (ethics approved)
- **Individual Differences** e.g., Personality (ethics approved)

## Miscellaneous: Identity, and Networks
- Morality, Identity, and Networks:
  - Reanalyse Moral Foundations data (no ethics needed)
- Proposed Pre-registered Replication of Novel Dilemma study [\color{blue}[@railton_moral_2017]\color{black}](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1-D_LgP687zYjRG5893pzAUYDykFt-F3I?usp=sharing)
- Disgust Sensitivity and Emotional Differentiation
